result.title: How to find Lowest Common Ancestor (LCA) if I can compute Kth ancestor of any node in O(logK) time ?
result.content: Hello, all. I was studying properties of the ancestors in the tree and solved a problem of finding the kth ancestor of any node in O(logK) time by pre-computing 2^jth parent of every node in O(NlogN) time. I am curious to know how can I apply this knowledge to find LCA of 2 given nodes efficiently?
